argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumsplit2.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumsplit2.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumsplit2.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsumsplit2.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsumsplit2.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsumsplit2.f | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsumsplit2.w | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 8 |  | gsumsplit2.i | |- ( ph -> ( C i^i D ) = (/) ) |
| 9 |  | gsumsplit2.u | |- ( ph -> A = ( C u. D ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. A |-> X ) = ( k e. A |-> X ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) : A --> B ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 11, 7, 8, 9 | #P_gsumsplit | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` C ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ssun1 | |- C C_ ( C u. D ) |
| 14 | 13, 9 | #P_syl5sseqr | |- ( ph -> C C_ A ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_resmptd | |- ( ph -> ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` C ) = ( k e. C |-> X ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` C ) ) = ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> X ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ssun2 | |- D C_ ( C u. D ) |
| 18 | 17, 9 | #P_syl5sseqr | |- ( ph -> D C_ A ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_resmptd | |- ( ph -> ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) = ( k e. D |-> X ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) ) = ( G gsum ( k e. D |-> X ) ) ) |
| 21 | 16, 20 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ph -> ( ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` C ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( ( k e. A |-> X ) |` D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. D |-> X ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 12, 21 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> X ) ) .+ ( G gsum ( k e. D |-> X ) ) ) ) |
